name: BallRotation
description:
This is my entry for the libgdx game jam #17, June 2021
Theme: Balls

How To Play:

  • Use arrow keys to rotate the game (hold left-shift to rotate faster)
  • Dodge red enemies (Sorry for dev art lmao)
  • Reach the goal to win!
  • F11- Toggle fullscreen
  • ESC - Quit

(Unfinished, would like to add more levels and features)
